mapper.select: SELECT * FROM punchrecord WHERE studentID = #{studentID} AND recordTime > 0 ORDER BY beginPunchTime DESC
SELECT SUM(recordTime) FROM punchrecord WHERE studentID = #{studentID} AND recordTime > 0 AND date_format(date, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d');
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO punchrecord (id, studentID, beginPunchTime, endPunchTime, recordTime, date) VALUES (#{id}, #{studentID}, #{beginPunchTime}, #{endPunchTime}, #{recordTime}, #{date});
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM punchrecord WHERE studentID = #{studentID} AND recordTime = 0;
